hero-main: Earn Money Passively with Your Phone
hero-sub: Turn your Android device into a passive income stream by helping mobile operators test their SMS services. No effort required - earn up to €0.03 per message automatically.
features-text: Simple, secure, and completely free - discover how EarnEZ turns your phone into an automatic income generator.

card1.title: Android Exclusive
card1.desc: Specifically designed for Android devices, our app utilizes the platform's unique SMS capabilities to help you earn money automatically.

card2.title: Privacy Protected
card2.desc: We only access our test messages - your personal data and private SMS remain completely secure and protected under GDPR regulations.

card3.title: Passive Income
card3.desc: Earn €0.01-0.03 per message automatically with zero effort. Just install the app and watch your earnings grow as you receive test SMS.

card4.title: Quick Payments
card4.desc: Withdraw your earnings once you reach €2, with most payments processed within 3 hours and guaranteed within 12 hours maximum.

about-text: We connect mobile network operators with real users like you, helping them test their SMS services while you earn.
about-list-1: Enable SMS sending to increase your earnings
about-list-2: Participate in call testing for additional income
faqs-text: Everything You Need to Know About Earning with EarnEZ - From Getting Started to Maximizing Your Passive Income

faqs-item1.title: How does EarnEZ generate income?
faqs-item1.desc: Mobile operators pay us to test their SMS services across different countries. When you install our app, your phone receives these test messages, and you earn €0.01-0.03 for each message automatically.

faqs-item2.title: Is my privacy protected when using EarnEZ?
faqs-item2.desc: Yes, we fully comply with GDPR regulations and only access our own test messages. Your personal SMS and data remain completely private and secure. We simply use your number for testing purposes.

faqs-item3.title: How do I start earning with EarnEZ?
faqs-item3.desc: Simply download our APK from the website and install it on your Android device. Once installed, the app works automatically in the background. No additional actions needed - you'll start earning right away.

faqs-item4.title: When and how do I receive my payments?
faqs-item4.desc: You can withdraw your earnings once you reach €2. Most payments are processed within 3 hours, with a maximum waiting time of 12 hours. No credit card or bank details needed to get started.

download-sub:

download-text: Transform your Android device into a passive income generator. Download our APK directly and start earning automatically with SMS testing.
download-sub2: Android Exclusive • Instant Setup • Secure Testing
